r.s: Library to create MP3 playlists on the fly, several formats supported including XML, RSS and XHTML
r.d: MP3_Playlist is a php library to facilitate the creation and to some extend the rendering of MP3 playlists. It scans a local folder with all the MP3 files and outputs the playlist in several formats including M3U, SMIL, XML, XHTML with the possibility to backup the lists on the fly with an SQLite DB.
r.n: QA release Package 2.0 Bug #8369 Send does not take care of filename parameter Bug #14935 Improve PHPCS Bug #14937 Make use of protected, not private
